attributes.action: The Tory leadership to stop the deselection of Dominic Grieve
attributes.background: Dominic Grieve has served as a MP for over 20 years. He's done so much for this country and served as Attorney General for 4 years. This deselection is nothing more than orchestrated campaign led by a former UKIP candidate. The Tory leadership can stop any deselection if it wants. We want it stopped

rejection.details: This petition is calling on the Conservative party, not the UK Government or Parliament, to act.
